speech: Our Spa & Ayurveda courses vary in duration, from short 2-week programs to comprehensive 3-month certifications. For example, Ayurveda Therapy courses are shorter, while Spa Management certification is more extensive. Would you like details on the schedule for a specific course?

The duration of our Spa & Ayurveda courses depends on the program. We offer flexible options, with short-term Ayurveda therapy sessions lasting 2 weeks, while the International Certificate in Spa Management spans 1 to 3 months. Are you interested in a specific program’s duration?

Our spa courses are designed to fit different time commitments, from 2-week courses in Ayurveda to 3-month spa management certifications. We also offer both weekday and weekend schedules to accommodate your needs. Let me know if you’d like specific timing details for a course.

Our Spa & Ayurveda Therapy programs range in duration to suit different schedules. You can complete shorter courses like Ayurveda Therapy in a few weeks, while more in-depth programs like Spa Management require a few months. Interested in a particular course schedule?

We offer a variety of course durations, from 2-week Ayurveda sessions to 3-month certifications in spa management. Schedules are flexible with options for both weekday and weekend classes. Let me know if you’d like details on a specific course’s timing.
